    • Rental

      public Rental​(int customerID, java.time.LocalDate date, int yearDeparture, int monthDeparture, int dayDeparture, int yearArrival, int monthArrival, int dayArrival)
      Creates a Rental entry for a rental
      Parameters:
      date - the date of the rental
      yearDeparture - the time at which the customer started the rental
      monthDeparture - the time at which the customer started the rental
      dayDeparture - the time at which the customer started the rental
      yearArrival - the time at which he has returned
      monthArrival - the time at which he has returned
      dayArrival - the time at which he has returned
      customerID - the Customer ID
